Articles.Content: Could we have a way to turn off mods in a new game if we have some but don't want to use them nor uninstall them?

I strongly support this, ideally we could choose mods on a per-save basis or at least pick and choose them at loading time. I keep four installs of KSP in various states of modding, that's about 6GB of space wasted on duplicate files which hurts on an SSD.

My main concern with this idea is that, to my knowledge, KSP isn't design to allow loading/unloading of plugins at runtime.

If this issue could be clarified/resolved, then the concept has merit.
This would be awesome. I have a shortcut for my KSP directory, and a folder there for uninstalled mods, as I often need to remove them. This would be much more better.
